FROM XML:
<xslTutorial>
<CAPTION>this</CAPTION><CAPTION>rocks</CAPTION>
<CAPTION>this</CAPTION>
<CAPTION>rocks</CAPTION>
<CAPTION>this</CAPTION>
<CAPTION>rocks</CAPTION>
<CAPTION>this</CAPTION>
<CAPTION>rocks</CAPTION>
<SPAN>this</SPAN><CAPTION>rocks</CAPTION>
<SPAN>this</SPAN>
<CAPTION>rocks</CAPTION>
</xslTutorial>
